Name: bonus
Description: Take an extra turn next turn.

Name: damageup
Description: Deal [sword]<value> more damage with each hit.

Name: bloodpact
Description: Damage dealt to you is also dealt to your opponent.

Name: dicelock_1
Description: You cannot roll a 1 for the rest of the fight.

Name: dicelock_2
Description: You cannot roll a 2 for the rest of the fight.

Name: dicelock_3
Description: You cannot roll a 3 for the rest of the fight.

Name: dicelock_4
Description: You cannot roll a 4 for the rest of the fight.

Name: dicelock_5
Description: You cannot roll a 5 for the rest of the fight.

Name: dicelock_6
Description: You cannot roll a 6 for the rest of the fight.
